title: Enhancing Systems Design Practical Competencies: Simulation/VR Utilization for Culture-Based Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design 3 culturally contextualized math problems connected to Indigenous students' daily lives.
Learners can develop and test ≥1 culture-based math activity scenario in VR environments.
Learners can incorporate ≥2 cultural interaction elements into simulations to enhance learner engagement.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
